entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Avoid boxing ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull arguments in Tier-0 #104512
  • System.TypeLoadException When Interface Type Contains Static Field/Property for Derived Struct Type #104511
  • Changes in the code while its process is running #104509
  • XPathNavigator.TypedValue fails to return normalized values in the value space of XSD xs:string subtypes like xs:normalizedString, xs:token, xs:language, xs:Name #104507
  • [NativeAOT] Intermittent crash accessing thread statics on Windows Arm64 #104500
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Use of "Repeat" seems incorrect #104495
  • System.Numerics.Complex Parse (string s, IFormatProvider? provider) don't work #104421
  • [BUG] typeof statements for types nested within generic types are incosistent #104510
  • `Debug.Assert(_readAheadTaskStatus == ReadAheadTask_CompletionReserved);` failure in HttpConnection #104491
  • [mono][wasm] wasm interop tracking #95084
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Get ThreadContext for AVX registers #104514
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Use IndexOfAnyExcept in BigInteger.IsPowerOfTwo #104513
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast` for `Int128` ↔`UInt128` operators #104506
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 docs #104505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-staging] [LibraryImportGenerator] Use basic forwarder in down-level support if any parameters can't be marshalled #104501
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix an issue with complex number parsing #104499
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics

Merged

  • Fix stackoverflow message for repeated frames #104508
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Update readAheadTask asserts in HttpConnection #104496
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] Add nativeaot support on LoongArch64. #103889
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.ConditionalExtract* APIs #104150
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Delete some unused HRESULT macro definitions #104484
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix an issue with complex number parsing #104388
    area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • Convert Array.IsSimpleCopy and CanAssignArray type to managed #104103
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #104408
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add some helper functions for getting the intrinsic ID to use for a given oper #104498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [build.ps1] Set the default architecture using an environment variable #104474
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update EOL versions (8.0-staging) #103393
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update-eol-versions-6.0-staging #103380
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Update EOL versions (main) #103379
    area-Infrastructure
  • Have mono handle the vector as APIs that grow or shrink the vector type #104445
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2489660 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeout for tracing/eventcounter/runtimecounters #104461
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Reduce allocations in Quic/HTTP3 #104394
    area-System.Net.Quic, 9.0.0
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Re-try when browser's WBT fail with `System.TimeoutException` #104481
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
